Traits.Name: Greenwalker
Traits.Description: All hobs ignore difficult and dangerous terrain.

Traits.Name: Phasing
Traits.Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Traits.Name: Aetherwall
Traits.Description: Cover from ranged attacks further away than range 2.

Traits.Name: Overdrive 4
Traits.Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round 4 or later.

Traits.Name: Deep Rooted
Traits.Description: At the start of any combat, place 4 deep roots on the map, which are size 1 summons with 25% of the Wissan's max HP and the Aetherwall trait. All roots must be accessible to characters and placed within range 6 of another root.

Traits.Name: Tied to the Tree
Traits.Description: The Wissan is intangible until all four roots have been destroyed. When they are destroyed, it is instantly defeated and disappears. It can teleport to any space adjacent to a root as a free action.

Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.

Actions.Name: Ancient Bolt
Actions.Effect: Foes in the line are electrified. Electrified characters take bonus damage.

Actions.Name: Root Lash
Actions.Description: A character in range 4 from a root summon or a deep root must save or be shoved as far as possible towards that root, or 1 space on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Dagon
Actions.Description: The Wissan ends its turn then marks out a line 6 area from its space, which becomes known to all characters. It must take a slow turn next round, but at the start of that turn, a freezing weapon made of water crashes into the first character in the line, making the following attack, which doesn't count against the per turn attack limit: Dagon, attack: On hit, 3[D] and inflict frostbite. Miss: [D]. Effect: Frosbitten characters are winded. Winded characters take +[D].

Actions.Name: Summon Root
Actions.Description: The Wissan creates a root, a sturdy size 1 summon in range 5. The area around the root is difficult terrain, and the root emits aura 1 around it. Foes in the aura are winded.
